description: This file defines a REST controller for a game backend, providing endpoints for retrieving game state, rolling dice, and moving tokens within a game room. It uses Spring Boot annotations and interacts with game and room services.

classes.name: GameController
classes.description: REST controller managing game state and actions for a specific game room, including fetching state, rolling dice, and moving tokens.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Retrieves current game state for the specified room code.

methods.name: roll
methods.description: Performs a dice roll for the current player in the specified room.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Moves a token for the current player based on the provided request parameters.
